Njalla.Wallet module

class Njalla.Wallet.NjallaWallet(api_key)[source]

Bases: object

add_payment(amount, via)[source]

Add a payment to the account. :param amount: Amount to add in EUR. (int) 5 or multiple of 15, max: 300 :param via: Payment method. Possible values: paypal, bitcoin, litecoin, monero, zcash, ethereum :return: amount (int), address (string, payment address), url (string, for paypal)

get_balance()[source]

Get the balance of the account.

Returns:

Balance (int) in EUR.

get_payment(payment_id)[source]

Get details about a payment

Parameters:

payment_id – ID of the payment.

Returns:

JSON object with the details of the payment.

list_transactions()[source]

List transactions (payments, registrations, renewals, etc.) of the last 90 days

Returns:

JSON object with the details of the transactions.
